bioAsHtml: Peter started his journey by building web apps for MTV, then helped kickstart the mobile development company In The Pocket as the Lead Developer. As Showpad's technical co-founder, he owns the first line of code of our platform.

acceptedTalks.title: You've built a prototype... and then it takes off

bio: Peter started his journey by building web apps for MTV, then helped kickstart the mobile development company In The Pocket as the Lead Developer. As Showpad's technical co-founder, he owns the first line of code of our platform.
